General.Name: Eternal Asia Supply Chain Management Ltd
General.Description: Eternal Asia Supply Chain Management Ltd. provides supply chain platforms, brand operations, marketing, and FMCG services in China and internationally. The company offers internet marketing, cross-border and logistics, purchasing and marketing integrated operation, government and enterprise procurement, and enterprise digital services. It also provides procurement services for small and medium-sized enterprises; and investment, financing, and incubation services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Wei Min  Chen
1.Title: Vice Chairman, Chief Risk Officer & Deputy GM
